Package org.cougaar.core.mts

This package contains the Cougaar support classes required to implement the MessageTransportService, such as MessageAddress.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AgentState An agents messaging state, used both by the AgentStatusService and to capture a mobile agent's unsent message state.
AgentStatusService This service is used by the metrics service to monitor agent and node messaging activity.
AttributeConstants Message attribute key/value constants.
Attributes Message key/value attributes, divided into transferable attributes and transient "local" attributes.
MessageAttributes Message attributes are just Attributes.
MessageHandler Message delivery callback for MessageSwitchService handlers.
MessageQueueDumpService This service and its implementation in the mtsstd module have a very specialized role.
MessageSecurityManager Security API to encode and decode messages.
MessageStatistics Message transport statistics API.
MessageTransportClient Required service requestor API for the MessageTransportService.
MessageTransportWatcher Callback API to monitor MessageTransportService traffic.
 

Class Summary
AgentStatusService.AgentState AgentStatusService state object
BaseServlet Basic Servlet with a refresh URL-parameter.
GroupMessageAddress An address that refers indirectly to a group of destinations.
InetMulticastMessageAddress Encapsulate an InetSocketAddress in a Cougaar GroupMessageAddress to support internet multicasts.
Message A message is an object sent from one agent (the "originator") to another agent (the "target") through the MessageTransportService.
MessageAddress An address for a Message sender or receiver.
MessageAddressWithAttributes A wrapped MessageAddress with added MessageAttributes.
MessageStatistics.Statistics MessageStatistics data
MulticastMessageAddress A marker class for multicasting messages.
ProtectedInputStream Filtered InputStream used by security.
ProtectedOutputStream Filtered OutputStream used by security.
SerializationUtils Utility methods for serializing objects to/from byte arrays.
SimpleMessageAddress A simple MessageAddress containing an agent name.
SimpleMessageAttributes A standard implementation of Attributes, not just MessageAttributes.
URIMessageAddress A MessageAddress containing a standard URI.
 

Enum Summary
AgentStatusService.Status  
 

Package org.cougaar.core.mts Description

This package contains the Cougaar support classes required to implement the MessageTransportService, such as MessageAddress.

The standard message transport implementation is the org.cougaar.mts.base.MessageTransportServiceProvider component.

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
